articles.title: Cricket SA wants to get to the bottom of Nxke resignation concerns, says CEO
articles.description: Acting Cricket South Africa CEO Pholetsi Moseki says the board is concerned about the issues former Proteas assistant coach Enoch Nkwe raised in his resignation.

articles.title: England cricket great Ted Dexter dies aged 86
articles.description: The former England captain, nicknamed 'Lord Ted', is fondly remembered as a giant of the game and one of his country's greatest players.

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.title: What we learned from the last test series
articles.description: An analysis of how both teams performed and what they can improve going forward.
